actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify and confirm the application of section 72 and the nonapplication of section 1282 to face-amount certificates.

summary.text: Allows an income tax exclusion under the Internal Revenue Code for face-amount certificates. Disallows the capital gains and loss treatment of such face-amount certificates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify and confirm the application of section 72 and the nonapplication of section 1282 to face-amount certificates.
